entry.title: Oh, I want something just like this
entry.content:
Something Just Like This â€“ The Chainsmokers,Coldplay

How much you wanna risk?

        
        

Iâ€™ve been reading books of old
The legends and the myths
Achilles and his gold
Hercules and his gifts
Spider-Manâ€™s control
And Batman with his fists
And clearly I donâ€™t see myself upon that list
But she said where dâ€™you wanna go?
How much you wanna risk?
Iâ€™m not looking for somebody
With some superhuman gifts
Some superhero, some fairytale bliss
Just something I can turn to, somebody I can kiss
I want something just like this
Do do do do do do do
Do do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Oh I want something just like this
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Oh I want something just like this
Oh I want something just like this

Iâ€™ve been reading books of old
The legends and the myths
The testaments they told
The moon and its eclipse
Superman unrolls
A suit before he lifts
But Iâ€™m not the kind of person that it fits

She said where dâ€™you wanna go?
How much you wanna risk?
Iâ€™m not looking for somebody
With some superhuman gifts
Some superhero, some fairytale bliss
Just something I can turn to, somebody I can miss
Oh I want something just like this
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Oh I want something just like this
Do do do do do do
Do do do do do do do
Do do do do do do
Oh I want something just like this
Oh I want something just like this

Where dâ€™you wanna go?
How much you wanna risk?
Iâ€™m not looking for somebody
With some superhuman gifts
Some superhero, some fairytale bliss
Just something I can turn to, somebody I can kiss
comments
  1. Itâ€™s not who you are underneath, itâ€™s what you do that defines you
  2. Keep your friends close and your enemies closer
  3. Be the change you want to see in the world.
  4. To remember, to let go, and to move on.
  5. DNA decides what we are, but not who we are. What we are never changed, but who we are never stop changing.
  6. Donâ€™t mistake coincidence for fate.

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#define LH +1  //å·¦é«˜
#define EH 0   //ç­‰é«˜
#define RH -1  //å³é«˜
#define FALSE 0
#define TRUE 1
#define OK 1
#define ERROR 0
#define OVERFLOW -1
typedef int Status;
typedef int RcdType;
/å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘ç»“æ„ä½“/
typedef struct BBSTNode {
â€‹    RcdType data;
â€‹    int bf;
â€‹    struct BBSTNode lchild, rchild;
}*BBSTree;
ç®—æ³•è®¾è®¡
/åˆå§‹åŒ–å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘/
Status InitBBST(BBSTree &T){
â€‹    T = NULL;
â€‹    return OK;
}
/é”€æ¯å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘/
void DestroyBBSTree(BBSTree &T){
â€‹    if(T != NULL){
â€‹        DestroyBBSTree(T -> lchild);
â€‹        DestroyBBSTree(T -> rchild);
â€‹        free(T);
â€‹        T = NULL;
â€‹    }
}
/åˆ¤ç©ºå¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘/
Status BBSTreeEmpty(BBSTree T){

â€‹        return TRUE;
â€‹    }
â€‹    else{
â€‹        return FALSE;
â€‹    }
}
/åˆ›å»ºä¸€æ£µå¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘/
void CreateBBST(BBSTree &T)
{
â€‹    RcdType e;

â€‹    Status taller = TRUE;
â€‹    printf(â€œ
è¯·è¾“å…¥å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„ç»“ç‚¹ä¸ªæ•°:â€);
â€‹    scanf(â€œ%dâ€, &num);
â€‹    getchar();
â€‹    printf(â€œè¯·é¡ºåºè¾“å…¥å…ƒç´ (æŒ‰â€™å›è½¦é”®â€™ç»“æŸ):â€);
â€‹    for (int i = 0; i < num; i++) {
â€‹        scanf(â€œ%dâ€, &e);
â€‹        InsertAVL(T, e, taller);
â€‹    }
}
/è¾“å‡ºå¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘/
void PrintTree(BBSTree T, int nLayer){
â€‹    if(T == NULL) {
â€‹        return;
â€‹    }
â€‹    PrintTree(T->rchild, nLayer + 4);
â€‹    for(int i = 0; i < nLayer; i++) {
â€‹        printf(â€œ â€œ);
â€‹    }
â€‹    printf(â€œ%d
â€, T->data);
â€‹    PrintTree(T->lchild, nLayer + 4);
}
/è¾“å‡ºå¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘/
void PrintTree1(BBSTree &T)
{
â€‹    if(T)
â€‹    {
â€‹        printf(â€œ%dâ€,T->data);
â€‹        if(T->lchild || T->rchild)
â€‹        {
â€‹            printf(â€œ(â€œ);
â€‹            PrintTree1(T->lchild);
â€‹            if(T->rchild)
â€‹                printf(â€œ,â€);
â€‹            PrintTree1(T->rchild);
â€‹            printf(â€œ)â€);
â€‹        }
â€‹    }
}
/å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„æ’å…¥æ“ä½œ/
/è‹¥å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘ä¸­ä¸å­˜åœ¨å€¼ä¸ºeçš„ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ™æ’å…¥åˆ°T/
Status InsertAVL(BBSTree &T, RcdType e, Status &taller){
â€‹    if(NULL==T){
â€‹        T = (BBSTree)malloc(sizeof(BBSTNode));
â€‹        T->data = e;
â€‹        T->bf = EH; 
â€‹        T->lchild = NULL; 
â€‹        T->rchild = NULL;
â€‹    }else if(e==T->data){ //ä¹¦ä¸­å·²å­˜åœ¨å’Œeç›¸ç­‰çš„ç»“ç‚¹ 
â€‹        taller = FALSE; return FALSE;        
â€‹    }else if(edata){
â€‹        if(FALSE==InsertAVL(T->lchild, e, taller)) return FALSE;
â€‹        if(TRUE==taller){
â€‹            switch(T->bf){
â€‹                case LH: LeftBalance(T); taller = FALSE; break;
â€‹                case EH: T->bf = LH; taller = TRUE; break;
â€‹                case RH: T->bf = EH; taller = FALSE; break;
â€‹            }
â€‹        }
â€‹    }else{
â€‹        if(FALSE==InsertAVL(T->rchild, e, taller)) return FALSE;
â€‹        if(TRUE==taller){
â€‹            switch(T->bf){
â€‹                case LH: T->bf = EH; taller = FALSE; break;
â€‹                case EH: T->bf = RH; taller = TRUE; break;
â€‹                case RH: RightBalance(T); taller = FALSE; break;
â€‹            }
â€‹        }
â€‹    }
â€‹    return TRUE;
}
/å·¦æ—‹è°ƒæ•´ï¼ˆå³æ—‹ä¸ä¹‹ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œä¸å†åˆ—å‡ºï¼‰/
void L_Rotate(BBSTree &p) {
â€‹    BBSTree rc = p -> rchild;
â€‹    p -> rchild = rc -> lchild;
â€‹    rc -> lchild = p;
â€‹    p = rc;
}
/å·¦å¹³è¡¡å¤„ç†æ“ä½œï¼ˆå³å¹³è¡¡ä¸ä¹‹ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œä¸å†åˆ—å‡ºï¼‰/
void LeftBalance(BBSTree &T){
â€‹    BBSTree lc, rd;
â€‹    lc = T->lchild;
â€‹    switch(lc->bf){
â€‹        case LH:
â€‹            T->bf = lc->bf = EH; R_Rotate(T); break;
â€‹        case RH:
â€‹            rd = lc->rchild;
â€‹            switch(rd->bf){
â€‹                case LH: T->bf = RH; lc->bf = EH; break;
â€‹                case EH: T->bf = lc->bf = EH; break;
â€‹                case RH: T->bf = EH; lc->bf = LH; break;
â€‹            }
â€‹            rd->bf = EH;
â€‹            L_Rotate(T->lchild);
â€‹            R_Rotate(T);
â€‹            break;
â€‹    }
}
/å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„åˆ é™¤æ“ä½œ/
/å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘ä¸­å­˜åœ¨å€¼ä¸ºkeyçš„ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ é™¤/
Status DeleteAVL(BBSTree &T, RcdType e, Status &shorter){
 //å½“è¢«åˆ ç»“ç‚¹æ˜¯æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå­©å­ï¼Œä¸”å…¶å‰é©±ç»“ç‚¹æ˜¯å·¦å­©å­æ—¶ï¼Œtag=1
â€‹    int tag = 0;
â€‹    if(T == NULL){
â€‹        return FALSE;    //å¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨å…ƒç´ ï¼Œè¿”å›å¤±è´¥
â€‹    }else if(e==T->data){
â€‹        BBSTNode *q = NULL;
â€‹        //å¦‚æœè¯¥ç»“ç‚¹åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­©å­ï¼Œåˆ™å°†è‡ªå­æ ‘å–ä»£è¯¥ç»“ç‚¹
â€‹        if(T->lchild == NULL){
â€‹            q = T;
â€‹            T = T->rchild;
â€‹            free(q);
â€‹            shorter = TRUE;
â€‹        }
â€‹        else if(T->rchild == NULL){
â€‹            q = T;
â€‹            T = T->lchild;
â€‹            free(q);
â€‹            shorter = TRUE;
â€‹        }
â€‹        //å¦‚æœè¢«åˆ ç»“ç‚¹æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå­©å­ï¼Œåˆ™æ‰¾åˆ°ç»“ç‚¹çš„å‰é©±ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œ
â€‹        //å¹¶å°†å‰é©±ç»“ç‚¹çš„å€¼èµ‹ç»™è¯¥ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ é™¤å‰é©±ç»“ç‚¹
â€‹        else{
â€‹            q = T->lchild;
â€‹            while(q->rchild){
â€‹                q = q->rchild;
â€‹            }
â€‹            T->data = q->data;
â€‹            if(T->lchild->data==q->data){
â€‹                tag = 1;
â€‹            }
â€‹            DeleteAVL(T->lchild, q->data, shorter);
â€‹            if(tag==1){
â€‹                BBSTree r = T->rchild;
â€‹                if(NULL==r) T->bf = 0;
â€‹                else{
â€‹                    switch(r->bf){
â€‹                        case EH: T->bf=-1;break;
â€‹                        default: RightBalance(T);break;
â€‹                    }
â€‹                }
â€‹            }
â€‹        }
â€‹    }else if(edata){        //å·¦å­æ ‘ä¸­ç»§ç»­æŸ¥æ‰¾
â€‹        if(!DeleteAVL(T->lchild, e, shorter)){
â€‹            return FALSE;
â€‹        }
â€‹        //åˆ é™¤å®Œç»“ç‚¹ä¹‹åï¼Œè°ƒæ•´ç»“ç‚¹çš„å¹³è¡¡å› å­
â€‹        if(shorter&&(tag==0))  {
â€‹            switch(T->bf){
â€‹                case LH:
â€‹                    T->bf = EH;
â€‹                    shorter = TRUE;
â€‹                    break;
â€‹                case EH:
â€‹                    T->bf = RH;
â€‹                    shorter = FALSE;
â€‹                    break;
â€‹                //å¦‚æœæœ¬æ¥å°±æ˜¯å³å­æ ‘è¾ƒé«˜ï¼Œåˆ é™¤ä¹‹åå°±ä¸å¹³è¡¡ï¼Œéœ€è¦åšå³å¹³è¡¡æ“ä½œ
â€‹                case RH:
â€‹                    RightBalance(T);    //å³å¹³è¡¡å¤„ç†
â€‹                    if(T->rchild->bf == EH)
â€‹                        shorter = FALSE;
â€‹                    else
â€‹                        shorter = TRUE;
â€‹                    break;
â€‹            }
â€‹        }
â€‹    }else if(e>T->data){ //å³å­æ ‘ä¸­ç»§ç»­æŸ¥æ‰¾
â€‹        if(!DeleteAVL(T->rchild, e, shorter)){
â€‹            return FALSE;
â€‹        }
â€‹        //åˆ é™¤å®Œç»“ç‚¹ä¹‹åï¼Œè°ƒæ•´ç»“ç‚¹çš„å¹³è¡¡å› å­
â€‹        if(shorter&&(tag==0))  {
â€‹            switch(T->bf){
â€‹                case LH:
â€‹                    LeftBalance(T);     //å·¦å¹³è¡¡å¤„ç†
â€‹                    if(T->lchild->bf == EH)
â€‹                        shorter = FALSE;
â€‹                    else
â€‹                        shorter = TRUE;
â€‹                    break;
â€‹                case EH:
â€‹                    T->bf = LH;
â€‹                    shorter = FALSE;
â€‹                    break;
â€‹                case RH:
â€‹                    T->bf = EH;
â€‹                    shorter = TRUE;
â€‹                    break;
â€‹            }
â€‹        }
â€‹        if(tag==1){
â€‹            int depthLeft = BBSTreeDepth(T->lchild);
â€‹            int depthRight = BBSTreeDepth(T->rchild);
â€‹            T->bf = depthLeft - depthRight;
â€‹        }
â€‹    }
â€‹    return TRUE;
}
/äºŒå‰å¹³è¡¡æ ‘æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„é€’å½’å®ç°/

â€‹    while(T) {

â€‹            T = T -> rchild;
â€‹        else
â€‹            return T;
â€‹    }

}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
